en.title: Your divorce
en.name: Name
en.respondToApplication: Respond to your {{ divorceWho }}’s divorce application
en.respondToAmendedApplication: Respond to your {{ divorceWho }}’s amended divorce application
en.getDecreeNisi: Your {{ divorceWho }} gets a decree nisi
en.readApplication: You need to read your {{ divorceWho }}’s application before you give your response. You can find a copy in the letter that was sent to you, and a digital version with guidance on what each section means on the next screen.
en.responseAcknowledgement: Your response is legally known as the 'acknowledgement of service'.
en.respond7Days: You must respond to the application within 7 working days of receiving the letter. If you don’t, your {{ divorceWho }} can ask the court to move the divorce forwards without you. You may have to pay extra fees if this happens.
en.respondMoreTime: If you are a respondent living outside of England and Wales, then you may have more days to reply to this divorce. Please refer to this below link:
en.respondMoreTimeLink: https://www.justice.gov.uk/courts/procedure-rules/family/practice_directions/pd_part_06b
en.divorceCenterHours:
Monday, Wednesday and Friday -phones are open 8am-6pm and Webchat open 8am-8pm.
Tuesday and Thursday - Webchat and phones are open 8am-8pm.
Saturdays - Webchat and phones are open 8am-2pm.

cy.title: Eich ysgariad
cy.name: Enw
cy.respondToApplication: Ymateb i gais eich {{ divorceWho }} am ysgariad
cy.respondToAmendedApplication: Ymateb i gais diwygiedig eich {{ divorceWho }} am ysgariad
cy.husbandWifeApplied: Mae eich {{ divorceWho }} yn gwneud cais
cy.getDecreeNisi: Bydd eich {{ divorceWho }} yn cael dyfarniad nisi
cy.madeFinal: Mae eich cais am ysgariad wedi’i gwblhau
cy.readApplication: Mae angen ichi ddarllen cais eich {{ divorceWho }} cyn ichi ymateb. Gellir gweld copi yn y llythyr a anfonwyd atoch, a fresiwn ddigidol gydag eglurhad ar bob adran ar y sgrîn nesaf.
cy.responseAcknowledgement: Yn gyfreithiol, dywedir eich bod, wrth ymateb yn ‘cydnabod cyflwyno’.
cy.respond7Days: Rhaid ichi ymateb i’r cais o fewn 7 diwrnod ar ôl i chi gael y llythyr. Os na wnewch hynny, gall eich {{ divorceWho }} ofyn i’r llys fynd ymlaen â’r ysgariad heboch. Mae’n bosib y bydd rhaid ichi dalu ffioedd ychwanegol os digwydd hyn.
